pr_title: docs - add info about new init --skip-register option

timeline.message: docs - add info about new init --skip-register option

timeline.bodyText: this is a bit inconsistent -y and --skip-register. I believe -s will also work, should we just document the short one ?
timeline.author: denalex
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -75,11 +75,14 @@ You can copy the extension files from a PXF installation on the host to the Gree ## Options -The `pxf init` command takes the following option: +The `pxf init` command takes the following options:
–y
Do not prompt, use the default `$PXF_CONF` directory location if the environment variable is not set.
+
––skip-register

replies.bodyText: well, we have -d and --delete for sync. I think it makes sense in that context
replies.author: frankgh

replies.bodyText: I prefer --skip-register since it's self explanatory
replies.author: frankgh
